  • Constructor Details

    • Request

      public Request(String requestId, String pharmId, String medicationName, int increaseStockBy, String notes, String approvedBy, Flag flag)
      Constructs a Request object with all attributes.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the unique ID of the request.
      pharmId - the ID of the pharmacist making the request.
      medicationName - the name of the medication for which stock is to be replenished.
      increaseStockBy - the quantity by which stock should be increased.
      notes - any additional notes or comments for the request.
      approvedBy - the ID of the administrator who approved the request (nullable).
      flag - the current status of the request.

    • Request

      public Request(String requestId, String pharmId, String medicationName, int increaseStockBy, String notes)
      Constructs a Request object with default flag set to PENDING and no approval information.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the unique ID of the request.
      pharmId - the ID of the pharmacist making the request.
      medicationName - the name of the medication for which stock is to be replenished.
      increaseStockBy - the quantity by which stock should be increased.
      notes - any additional notes or comments for the request.
